data.text: @glen_you_win Wishing you a very Merry Christmas and a happy new year!
@waytoChe Welcome aboard! We're glad to have you on our wings. Have a wonderful journey and happy holidays!
RT @Khiemlejonathan: I just download Asiana mobile apps I will booking flight to my hometown through this app #AsianaAirlines http://t.co/P…
@keemberbee Merry Christmas!
@waytoChe We think Asiana! ;)
@choukevin @united If you're a UA Mileage Plus member, you might want to verify with their service department on the status of the miles.
@lizanatallia Thank you! Merry Christmas and happy new year to you, too! :)
@Cecicano777 Hope you have a very merry Christmas and a happy new year! :)
Preparing for take-off! #AsianaAirlines #flyASIANA http://t.co/hSuJbl8DUV
@hk0741 Hi Hana~ Hope you have a merry Christmas and a happy new year!
@DJKim0701 Hello Daejoon~ Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
@timtoolman1958 Hello Tim! Hope you have a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
@Nevetsah Hello Steven! Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
@respondandreact Hi Nak! Hope you have a Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
@geoSteven Hi Steven! We hope you have a merry Christmas and a happy new year!
@bigmalx Hi Malcolm! Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
@cho_alice Hi Alice! We hope you have a very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
@BNTVosburgh Hi Nicole~ Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! We hope you have a great one!
@AiyanaYJ Hello Aiyana~ Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
@candiiewish Hello Kim! Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
@itsdanieljae Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
@nan4bsb Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! We hope you're enjoying the 2AM CD and poster!
@weninchina Merry Christmas and Happy New Year, Scott! We hope you have a great one!
@4lifelovatic_ Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
@ChippySingson Merry Christmas Chippy!
@EdsonRibeiro92 Merry Christmas to you too, Edson! Hope you have a great one!
Our cargo flight in Anchorage, Alaska looking into the sunset... Can you feel the coldness? http://t.co/ESJ9Fixdfh
Are you a fan of #2AM and couldn't win a signed CD & poster from us? Follow and RT now for another chance to win! http://t.co/GvPNrCQYH3
RT @DFWHeavy: An @AsianaAirlines #Boeing 747-48E [HL-7418] landing on 24L @LAX_Official on September 01, 2013: http://t.co/6fwMDQrF7J #avge…
Can you guess which one of our US destination this #ChristmasTree is located? http://t.co/JXp2WvtJ81
@msoffia We hope you come on board with us soon!
@canadiankms And happy holidays!
@canadiankms Welcome aboard! Be sure to tweet us photos! :)
@GregDB2011 Hope you enjoy your flight with us! Be sure to tweet us your experience!
Where's your next destination for the holiday season? Only a few more days left until Christmas!… http://t.co/r9MuOx92Xj
RT @Eru_Indonesia: [131218] ERU Official LINE Update - Ceremony Ambassador for Indonesia , Asiana Airlines (1) http://t.co/98buqDtz6M
@daniloruffo Same to you! Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
@nan4bsb We've sent you a DM. Please check and respond! Thanks.
Our winner for the #2AM signed CD and poster goes to @nan4bsb! Congratulations! :)
More detailed info on our Coat-Check service here: http://t.co/QwFsFmvv9A http://t.co/MCc943jJk2
Escaping to a warmer place this winter? Check in your coat with us up to 5-days free at ICN Airport! http://t.co/Ztzh49mwhW
Hello KPOP fans! Be sure to Follow us and RT for your chance to win #2AM autographed CDs and poster! #AsianaAirlines http://t.co/I9yjjWqbVY
Do you have Christmas spirit? Some of our staff members are spreading holiday cheer through Ugly Christmas Sweaters! http://t.co/1gVyBsXyaK
@carryonlearning It looks like the check-in process is working on our end. Would you mind trying this link? http://t.co/pZeCQb26IR
@carryonlearning We've sent a reply. Thanks!
@carryonlearning Would you mind sending us your confirmation code through DM so that we could try to help you on that?
Santa came early this holiday season for KPOP lovers. Wanna win #2am-autographed CD & poster? Follow and RT to win! http://t.co/PqNxuWzRMd
@George_Barff Sorry about that. We'll be sure to pass on the word. In the meantime, should you have any questions, please let us know! Thx!
@carryonlearning Is your flight within the next 2-3 days? If so, please DM us your confirmation code.
@pilotmwangi Was it too simple?
Hello, Tweeps! Can you name this airport? http://t.co/plOnzxvqty
@Michism Hello, OZ211/212 normally operates the Business Smartium seats, unless there is an aircraft change.
RT @Airbus: Great news! @AsianaAirlines 1st #A380 has successfully completed its maiden flight http://t.co/OiWKH8tw56 http://t.co/SIqX6oMtTZ
RT @AerospaceInfo: A380 for @AsianaAirlines http://t.co/KmZUhEFe4l
RT @planemadblog: Asiana Airlines A380 first flight landing Hamburg Finkenwerder @AsianaAirlines  http://t.co/CAjMG1UTrf
We're dreaming of a white Christmas! Feel the fluff of the snow beneath your feet with every step you take in Seoul. http://t.co/wMhZbUfbfj
Happy Holidays! :P http://t.co/xiroBHRm26 Photo by @irontango
@moist4life All drinks are free! ;) Cheers!
RT @moist4life: Loving my @AsianaAirlines plane! USB recharger, plug socket, fancy TV. If only the beer was free. What? Oh......
If you thought the world of Narnia was cool, come visit the N Seoul Tower this winter season! Photo courtesy of KTO. http://t.co/1zaGHrcRiZ
RT @gracepowers: Plane decorated for Christmas. @AsianaAirlines is awesome. http://t.co/WNHXoV0UnJ
RT @CX881: @AsianaAirlines : Each of your FA is very well deserved for this award. Can't wait to fly with Asiana again!! :)
@CX881 Thank you! :) We hope to see you on board soon!
Happy Monday! We won "Best Flight Attendants in the World" by Premier Traveler, among others: http://t.co/rLXug7yUQi http://t.co/JINnUyLvdf

annotations.normalized_text: Best Flight Attendants in the World

data.text: @napturaltravel No, not yet! We are hoping for it sometime in the future.
@Armanranala Yes, it is!
RT @IsangEnders: Leaving Seoul. A sad moment as usual.See you soon! #FlyingWithaCelloIsExhaustingAsUsual #ImminGabang @AsianaAirlines http:…
@SH1NEEKEY Hello, Please DM us your reservation number and e-mail address and we'll have our reservation specialists contact you. Thank you!
RT @tweetbypremier: Premier Traveler poses with the Best  Flight Attendants in the World. @AsianaAirlines #ptgala http://t.co/sfGWRvHyV0
@WillyPeeps What is your confirmation number?
Here's a photo of our Business Smartium lay-flat seat by @sryanpark213! http://t.co/A5bgGV4iw7 Have you flown our Premium BIZ class yet?
@WillyPeeps We'll try on our end and see what's going on.
@WillyPeeps Hello, we're aware of an internal error yesterday, but it should be working today. Could you DM us your reservation number?
@vcdxnz001 Hobbits! That's very tempting... :) Maybe we'll have it in our plans for the future...
With the weather getting colder by the day, we can only dream of the holiday spirit! Where will you go this season? #Travel
@Scully3030 Yes, the internal server error was being worked on today. Please excuse us for the maintenance issues.  :( Thank you!
"A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step." -Lao Tzu #travelquotes #travel #flyasiana http://t.co/HGw1zKO6Vn
Good morning and #HappyHumpDay! Here's a photo by @shellalaucg to start off your day: http://t.co/SwC1j04QsP
@shellalaucg Thank you for coming on board with us! :)
@JohnJayL @united @staralliance Happy Traveling, John! :)
@Davidson_Jenn @STATravel_UK Thank you for the kind compliments. Check back with us should you have any more questions. Happy Holidays! :)
@JohnnyRama @IncheonAirport We're glad we made it to your favorites list! :) Happy traveling!
@butterfli253 We hope to have you on board soon, as well! :) Happy Holidays!
RT @Khiemlejonathan: can't wait to fly with you next year #AsianaAirlines http://t.co/POcUTR5VxV
@Khiemlejonathan Welcome aboard! :)
Want to read about our BIZ class service from SEA-ICN (OZ271)? Head on over to http://t.co/V5eWpby0Bh (cc: @flight_report)
@paksaltopam Sorry about the language mishap. Which e-mail address did you send it to? We'd be more than happy to assist you on this.
Hello Tweeps! If you could pick a place to fly to... where? #SaekdongiAdventures #WhereInTheWorldIsSaekdongi http://t.co/stmcW0dsa5
We're adding flights to HANOI, Vietnam via OZ727/728! More info here: http://t.co/vp0eJFWTS1 http://t.co/vZVC0hDMz5
@DorianGriner Thank you! Happy holidays to you, as well! :)
@Davidson_Jenn We've sent a reply. Thanks!
Where has the time gone? It's already December! Here's another look at our A380 in-the-making: http://t.co/EMMfvNByz2
@Davidson_Jenn Hi Jennifer, sorry for the delay. DM us your inquiry with your reservation number and we'll assist you.
Happy Monday! :) RT @aviacion98: @AsianaAirlines thanks for following. I dedicate this photo http://t.co/hFThFvqXFe
RT @ArtworkBeans: Thank you for the wonderful services & polite staffs @AsianaAirlines:). Happy #Thanksgiving & happy holiday:D. Cheers~.
@tammystweets Have you tried calling our reservation center? Our specialists may help you with your options. 800-227-4262
Pick a drink, any drink! Come visit the newly renovated Star Alliance Lounge at LAX! #LAX… http://t.co/XKeiOU6YKb
